comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Dr. Anton Meyer-Gerhard MEYER-GERHARD TO TELL KAISER OF OUR STAND; Bernstorff's Envoy Arrives in Berlin and Confers with Imperial Officials. AWAITS CALL OF EMPEROR Dr. Dernburg Also to be Consulted Before Germany Replies to the American Note. HOAX CHARGE IS SCOUTED Berlin Brands "A. Meyer" Story as Nonsense -- Count von Bernstorff to Explain. Dr. Anton Meyer-Gerhard, the special emissary of Count von Bernstorff, the German Ambassador at Washington, arrived in Berlin last night, and his first official call today was paid to his chief at the Colonial Office. select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FA0A13F9395B1773...

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks Richard Arthur Norton for his full name and link to the story. If you search for his name in the Library's Chronicling America page at chroniclingamerica.loc.gov. Apparently there was a rumor that he was actually someone named Alfred Meyer and was in the US buying ammunition for the Germans.
